subject: [junit] : Help for System Test Cases
msgSnippet: Hi, I am currently using StrutsTestCase for unit testing the application. But can somebody suggest what framework to use to create System Test Cases. Regards,
messageBody:
Hi,

I am currently using StrutsTestCase for unit testing
the application.

But can somebody suggest what framework to use to
create System Test Cases.

Regards,
Gunjeet
